name: Neck Collar
descr:
Problems in the neck- and shoulder region are quite common these days. A stable neck collar can help in reducing paing and supply required support. Stabilising the shoulder joint, without affecting functional level, can however be a challenge.
The Chiroform Neck Collar is anatomically designed for the best comfort. Provides stability and pain relief. Indications: Torticollis, overburdening strains and rheumatism.
 
All collars have the height of 10 cm.
